PATIENT_ID: TEST_AUTOPSY_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-25 01:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-25 01:10:00
Category I activation for 55-year-old male, pedestrian struck by vehicle.
Multiple injuries. GCS 3 on arrival. CPR in progress.
Trauma patient death at 01:45. Time of death documented.
Pronounced dead at 01:45.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-25 02:00:00
CT imaging completed prior to death showed massive intracranial hemorrhage.
Imaging status: CT head completed pre-arrest.
No operative intervention performed prior to death.
Operative status: no surgery prior to death.
Trauma Surgeon determination: unexpected death.
Cause of death: traumatic brain injury with cerebral herniation.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-25 02:15:00
Vanderburgh County Coroner notified per policy. VCC contacted at 02:10.
Coroner accepted the case. VCC will direct the autopsy process.
Patient is not an organ donor. Organ donor status documented.
Family notified of death. Autopsy consent discussion not required (VCC case).
